comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Published in Locust Valley, by Joan Harrison, Amy Dzija Driscoll. Arcadia Publishing, 2012 books.google.com/books?id=rS3GP0GAtXQC&pg=PA102&l... which indicates that bobsledding was an active pastime in Locust Valley.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The sun. (New York [N.Y.]), 06 Feb. 1916. Second Section, Sporting and Automobiles, Page 12 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030272/1916-02-06/ed-... reports that "thousands of residents of Nassau County were at Locust Valley this afternoon for the annual bobsled races, which are a feature of winter life on Long Island." "The Matinicock entry, composed of twenty-five women, many of whom are prominent in society in Oyster Bay and Locust Valley, finished in third place.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you for your research on Locust Valley winter sports, swanq. We'll add some of the information to each of the records the next time we update.
